ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: Lost and Found
ComicInfo.Series: The Adventures of Augusta Wind: The Last Story
ComicInfo.Summary:
Beginning the five-issue conclusion of this epic, all-ages fantasy! With a malevolent entity about to un-tell every story ever told, erase every character ever imagined (including you!), it’s up to Augusta Wind, Mr. Snabbit, the Omniphant and Upton Snuff to stop the Story Killer and save the Storiverse. But weird worlds, bizarre creatures and terrible dangers await them—and victory is not assured!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 23:27:30. [CVDB542499]
ComicInfo.Characters: Augusta Wind, Mr. Snabbit, Story Killer, The Omniphant, Upton Snuff
